title: Shiki-Jitsu (Hideaki Anno)
description: Shiki-Jitsu is Hideaki Anno&#039;s (creator and director of Neon Genesis Evangelion, Love and Pop) second live-action film. Literally translated it means "Ritual Day" or sometimes "Ceremonial Day". The film tells the story of a director who meets an odd young woman in his home town. The story takes place over a period of 33 days. The film was both written and directed by Anno.
